pageContext.claim: “Cryin Chuck Schumer, compared to what other Senators have brought home to their states, has brought very little back to N.Y. A totally overrated loser, the one thing he has given them is SALT. He never even called me to stop it. No wonder Cuomo & most others can't stand him. AOC!”
pageContext.analysis: The changes to state and local tax (SALT) rules were a result of Trump’s 2017 tax cut. Schumer lobbied against these changes but had little traction as he was in the minority.
